price: Watasema: Kwa hakika nyinyi mlikuwa mkitujia upande wa kulia.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
footnotes: Wanyonge watawaambia walio jipa ukubwa: Nyinyi mlikuwa mkitujia upande tulio udhania ni wa kheri na mafanikio, ili mtugeuze njia tuache Haki twende kwenye upotovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
